template.name: INSTANCE_OF_CLASS
template.description: Used to create instance of class.

template.name: INSTANCE_OF_CLASS_AS_METHOD
template.description: Used to create instance of class as method.
template.template-body:
<fc:method name="${methodName}" class="${targetClass.fullyQualifiedName}" optional="false" import="${class.fullyQualifiedName}">
						##<fc:import>${class.fullyQualifiedName}</fc:import>
						/**
						 * This will create an instance of ${class.name}
						 *
						 #foreach ($field in ${fields})
						 * @parm ${field.type.name}
						 #end
						 * @return
						 *
						 */
						public static ${class.name} create${class.name}(#foreach ($field in ${fields}) final ${field.type.name} ${field.name} #if ($foreach.count < ${fields.size()}),#end #end) {
						final ${class.name} ${class.defaultInstance} = new ${class.name}();
						#foreach ($field in ${fields})
							<fc:import optional="true">${field.type.fullyQualifiedName}</fc:import>
							${class.defaultInstance}.${field.setter}(${field.name});
						#end
						return ${class.defaultInstance};
						}
						</fc:method>
						#if($staticImport)
							<fc:import>${targetClass.fullyQualifiedName}#create${class.name}</fc:import>
						#else
							<fc:import>${targetClass.fullyQualifiedName}</fc:import>
						#end
						<fc:import>${class.fullyQualifiedName}</fc:import>
						${class.name} ${class.defaultInstance} = create${class.name}(#foreach ($field in ${fields}) ${field.value} #if ($foreach.count < ${fields.size()}),#end #end);

template.name: INSTANCE_OF_CLASS_WEB
template.description: Used to create instance of class in web tier e.g. jsp, xthtml etc.
template.template-body: #if (${_template_variation} == "default") var ${class.defaultInstance} = new Object(); #foreach ($field in ${fields}) ${class.defaultInstance}.${field.name} = ${field.value}; #end #end #if (${_template_variation} == "jsp:useBean") <jsp:useBean id="${class.defaultInstance}" scope="page" class="${class.fullyQualifiedName}"> #foreach ($field in ${fields}) <jsp:setProperty name="${class.defaultInstance}" property="${field.fullName}" value="${field.value}" /> #end </jsp:useBean> #end #if (${_template_variation} == "bean:define") <bean:define id="${class.defaultInstance}" class="${class.fullyQualifiedName}"> #end #if (${_template_variation} == "ExtJs") #foreach ($field in ${fields}) #if (${field.type.name.endsWith("String")}) #set ($field_type = "textfield") #elseif (${field.type.name.endsWith("Date")}) #set ($field_type = "datefield") #elseif (${field.type.name.endsWith("Boolean")} || ${field.type.name.endsWith("boolean")}) #set ($field_type = "checkbox") #end { xtype : '${field_type}', fieldLabel : '${field.nameAsWord}', name : '${field.name}' }#if ($foreach.count < ${fields.size()}), #end #end #end

template.name: PRINT_FIELDS_OF_CLASS
template.description: Used to print fields of a class.
template.variation: logger.debug logger.trace logger.info logger.error System.out.println System.err.println

template.name: EXTRACT_FIELDS_FROM_CLASS
template.description: Used to extract fields from a java class.
template.template-body: #set ($modifier = "final ") #foreach ($field in ${fields}) <fc:import>${field.type.fullyQualifiedName}</fc:import> ${modifier} ${field.type.name} ${field.name} = ${instance}.${field.getter}(); #end

template.name: PRINT_FIELDS_OF_CLASS_WEB
template.description: Used to print fields of class Jsp.
template.variation: html:text html:textarea html:select html:checkbox html:radio h:inputText h:inputText-validation h:selectSingleMenu h:selectManyMenu
template.template-body:
#foreach ($field in ${fields}) #if (${_template_variation} == "html:text" || ${_template_variation} == "html:textarea" || ${_template_variation} == "html:radio" || ${_template_variation} == "html:checkbox") #end #if (${_template_variation} == "html:select") #end #if (${_template_variation} == "h:inputText") <${_template_variation} id="${field.name}" value="\#\{${class.defaultInstance}.${field.name}\}" /> #end #if (${_template_variation} == "h:inputText-validation") <${_template_variation} id="${field.name}" value="\#\{${class.defaultInstance}.${field.name}\}" > #end #if (${_template_variation} == "h:selectSingleMenu") <${_template_variation} value="\#{${class.defaultInstance}.${field.name}}"> #end #if (${_template_variation} == "h:selectManyMenu") <${_template_variation} value="${class.defaultInstance}.${field.name}"> #end #end
: <${_template_variation} name="${class.defaultInstance}" property="${field.name}" size="10"/>

template.name: PRINT_FIELDS_OF_CLASS_WEB_SINGLE
template.description: Used to print a single field of a class in Jsp.
template.variation: h:inputText h:inputSecret h:inputHidden h:inputTextarea h:selectBooleanCheckbox h:selectOneRadio h:selectOneMenu h:inputText-validation h:selectSingleMenu h:selectManyMenu
template.template-body: #if (!${field}) ##no fields selected exitng... #end #if (${_template_variation} == "html:text" || ${_template_variation} == "html:textarea" || ${_template_variation} == "html:radio" || ${_template_variation} == "html:checkbox") : <${_template_variation} name="${class.defaultInstance}" property="${field.name}" size="10"/> #end #if (${_template_variation} == "html:select") #end #if (${_template_variation} == "h:inputText") <${_template_variation} id="name" value="\#\{${class.defaultInstance}.${field.name}\}" /> #end #if (${_template_variation} == "h:inputText-validation") <${_template_variation} id="${field.name}" value="\#\{${class.defaultInstance}.${field.name}\}" > #end #if (${_template_variation} == "h:selectSingleMenu") <${_template_variation} value="\#{${class.defaultInstance}.${field.name}}"> #end #if (${_template_variation} == "h:selectManyMenu") <${_template_variation} value="${class.defaultInstance}.${field.name}"> #end

template.name: COPY_CLASS_AS_METHOD
template.description: Used to create a method copy one class to another.

template.name: TOSTRING_METHOD
template.description: Used to create a toString method.

template.name: HQL_SELECT
template.description: Used to create a HQL select statement.
template.template-body:
#set ($select_part = "") #if (!${fields} || ${fields.size()} == 0) #set ($select_part = "${class.defaultInstance}") #end #foreach ($field in ${fields}) #set ($select_part = "${select_part} ${class.defaultInstance}.${field.fullName}") #if ($foreach.count < ${fields.size()}) #set ($select_part = "${select_part}, ") #end #end
#set ($join_part = "") #foreach ($field in ${join_fields}) #set ($join_part = "${join_part} join ${class.defaultInstance}.${field.fullName}") #end
#set ($where_part = "") #if (${where_fields} && ${where_fields.size()} > 0) #set ($where_part = "where") #end #foreach ($field in ${where_fields}) #set ($where_part = "$where_part ${field.fullName} ${where_qualifier} :${field.name}") #if ($foreach.count < ${where_fields.size()}) #set ($where_part = "${where_part} ${where_separator} ") #end #end final String hqlQuery = "select ${select_part} from ${class.name} ${class.defaultInstance} ${where_part}"; final Query query = session.createQuery(hqlQuery); #foreach ($field in ${where_fields}) query.setParameter("${field.name}", null); #end

template.name: HQL_SELECT_WITH_NAMED_QUERY
template.description: Used to create a HQL select statement with named query.

template.name: HQL_SELECT_NAMED_QUERY_WITH_ANNOTATION
template.description: Used to create a HQL select statement with named query and annotation.

template.name: HQL_UPDATE
template.description: Used to create a HQL update statement.
template.template-body:
#set ($update_part = "") #foreach ($field in ${fields}) #set ($update_part = "${update_part} ${field.fullName} = :${field.name}") #if ($foreach.count < ${fields.size()}) #set ($update_part = "${update_part}, ") #end #end #set ($where_part = "") #if (${where_fields} && ${where_fields.size()} > 0) #set ($where_part = "where ") #end #foreach ($field in ${where_fields}) #set ($where_part = "${where_part} ${field.fullName} ${where_qualifier} :${field.name}") #if ($foreach.count < ${where_fields.size()}) #set ($where_part = "${where_part} ${where_separator} ") #end #end
final String hqlQuery = "update ${class.name} set ${update_part} ${where_part}"; final Query query = session.createQuery(hqlQuery); #foreach ($field in ${where_fields}) query.setParameter("${field.name}", null); #end

template.name: HQL_UPDATE_WITH_NAMED_QUERY
template.description: Used to create a HQL update statement with named query.
template.template-body:
// named Query\n final Query query = em.createnamedQuery("${queryName}");
#foreach ($field in ${where_fields}) query.setParameter("${field.name}", null); #end #if (!${useExistingNamedQuery}) <fc:xml parent="entity-mappings" node="named-query" file="${target}"> #set ($update_part = "") #foreach ($field in ${fields}) #set ($update_part = "${update_part} ${field.fullName} = :${field.name}") #if ($foreach.count < ${fields.size()}) #set ($update_part = "${update_part}, ") #end #end #set ($where_part = "") #if (${where_fields} && ${where_fields.size()} > 0) #set ($where_part = "where ") #end #foreach ($field in ${where_fields}) #set ($where_part = "${where_part} ${field.fullName} ${where_qualifier} :${field.name}") #if ($foreach.count < ${where_fields.size()}) #set ($where_part = "${where_part} ${where_separator} ") #end #end <named-query name="${queryName}"> <query> <![CDATA[ update ${class.name} set ${update_part} ${where_part} ]]> </query> </named-query> </fc:xml> #end

template.name: HQL_UPDATE_NAMED_QUERY_WITH_ANNOTATION
template.description: Used to create a HQL update statement with named query and annotation.
template.template-body: // named Query\n final Query query = em.createnamedQuery("${queryName}"); #foreach ($field in ${where_fields}) query.setParameter("${field.name}", null); #end #if (!${useExistingNamedQuery}) <fc:xml parent="entity-mappings" node="named-query" file="${target}"> #set ($update_part = "") #foreach ($field in ${fields}) #set ($update_part = "${update_part} ${field.fullName} = :${field.name}") #if ($foreach.count < ${fields.size()}) #set ($update_part = "${update_part}, ") #end #end #set ($where_part = "") #if (${where_fields} && ${where_fields.size()} > 0) #set ($where_part = "where ") #end #foreach ($field in ${where_fields}) #set ($where_part = "${where_part} ${field.fullName} ${where_qualifier} :${field.name}") #if ($foreach.count < ${where_fields.size()}) #set ($where_part = "${where_part} ${where_separator} ") #end #end <named-query name="${queryName}"> <query> <![CDATA[ update ${class.name} set ${update_part} ${where_part} ]]> </query> </named-query> </fc:xml> #end

template.name: HQL_DELETE
template.description: This is used to create HQL delete statement.
template.template-body: #set ($where_part = "") #if (${where_fields} && ${where_fields.size()} > 0) #set ($where_part = "where ") #end #foreach ($field in ${where_fields}) #set ($where_part = "${where_part} ${field.fullName} ${where_qualifier} :${field.name}") #if ($foreach.count < ${where_fields.size()}) #set ($where_part = "${where_part} ${where_separator} ") #end #end final String hqlQuery = "delete from ${class.name} ${where_part}"; final Query query = session.createQuery(hqlQuery); #foreach ($field in ${where_fields}) query.setParameter("${field.name}", null); #end

template.name: HQL_DELETE_WITH_NAMED_QUERY
template.description: This is used to create HQL delete statement with named query.
template.template-body: // named Query\n final Query query = session.createnamedQuery("${queryName}"); #foreach ($field in ${where_fields}) query.setParameter("${field.name}", null); #end #if (!${useExistingNamedQuery}) <fc:xml parent="entity-mappings" node="named-query" file="${target}"> #set ($where_part = "") #if (${where_fields} && ${where_fields.size()} > 0) #set ($where_part = "where ") #end #foreach ($field in ${where_fields}) #set ($where_part = "${where_part} ${field.fullName} ${where_qualifier} :${field.name}") #if ($foreach.count < ${where_fields.size()}) #set ($where_part = "${where_part} ${where_separator} ") #end #end <named-query name="${queryName}"> <query> <![CDATA[ delete from ${class.name} ${where_part} ]]> </query> </named-query> </fc:xml> #end

template.name: HQL_DELETE_NAMED_QUERY_WITH_ANNOTATION
template.description: This is used to create HQL delete statement with named query and annotation.
template.template-body: // named Query\n final Query query = session.createnamedQuery("${queryName}"); #foreach ($field in ${where_fields}) query.setParameter("${field.name}", null); #end #if (!${useExistingNamedQuery}) <fc:xml parent="entity-mappings" node="named-query" file="${target}"> #set ($where_part = "") #if (${where_fields} && ${where_fields.size()} > 0) #set ($where_part = "where ") #end #foreach ($field in ${where_fields}) #set ($where_part = "${where_part} ${field.fullName} ${where_qualifier} :${field.name}") #if ($foreach.count < ${where_fields.size()}) #set ($where_part = "${where_part} ${where_separator} ") #end #end <named-query name="${queryName}"> <query> <![CDATA[ delete from ${class.name} ${where_part} ]]> </query> </named-query> </fc:xml> #end

template.name: DOZER_MAPPING
template.description: This is used to create dozer mapping between two classes.
template.template-body: ${from_class.fullyQualifiedName} ${to_class.fullyQualifiedName} #foreach ($field in ${fields}) ${field.fullName} ${field.fullName} #end

template.name: DOZER_MAPPING_SINGLE
template.description: This is used to create a single dozer mapping between two classes.
template.template-body: #foreach ($field in ${from_fields}) #set ($from_field = $field) #end #foreach ($field in ${to_fields}) #set ($to_field = $field) #end ${from_field.fullName} ${to_field.fullName}

template.name: RESOURCE_BUNDLE
template.description: Used to Create Resource bundle.
template.template-body: # Resource Bundle for ${class.fullyQualifiedName}\n #foreach ($field in ${fields}) #if (${prefix} && !${prefix.trim().equals("")}) ##validation for additional parameters ${prefix}.${field.name} = ${field.nameAsWord} #else ${class.defaultInstance}.${field.name} = ${field.nameAsWord} #end #end

template.name: RESOURCE_BUNDLE_AS_FILE
template.description: Used to Create Resource bundle as a file.
template.template-body: <fc:file folder="${folder.projectRelativePath}" name="${fileName}.properties" project="${project.name}"> # Resource Bundle for ${class.fullyQualifiedName}\n #foreach ($field in ${fields}) #if((${prefix} && !${prefix.trim().equals("")})) ${prefix}.${field.name} = ${field.nameAsWord} #else ${class.defaultInstance}.${field.name} = ${field.nameAsWord} #end #end </fc:file>

template.name: PRINT_RESOURCE_BUNDLE
template.description: Used to print Resource bundle in a jsp or xhtml file.
template.template-body: ${property.name}

template.name: SIMPLE_CLASS_SNIPPET
template.description: This is used to create a simple snippet with classes.

template.name: SIMPLE_FILE_SNIPPET
template.description: This is used to create a simple snippet with files.
template.template-body: #if (${_template_variation} == "file-name") #foreach ($file in ${files}) ${file.name} #end #end #if (${_template_variation} == "fully-qualified-file-name") ${file.fullPath} #end

template.name: METHOD_SNIPPET
template.description: Used to create method snippet.

template.name: HASHCODE_AND_EQUALS_METHODS
template.description: Used to create hashcode() and equals() method snippet.
template.template-body:
<fc:method name="hashcode">
			/**
                 * hashcode method for ${class.name}
                 *
                 * @see java.lang.Object#hashCode()
                 */
            @Override
			public int hashCode(){
			final int prime = 31;
			int result = 1;
			#foreach ($field in ${fields})
				#if (${field.typeNative})
				 	#if( ${field.type.name} == "long")
				 		result = prime * result  + (int)(this.${field.name} ^ this.${field.name} >>> 32);
				 	#elseif (${field.type.name} == "boolean")
				 		result = prime * result + (this.${field.name} ? 1231 : 1237);
				 	#elseif (${field.type.name} == "float")
				 		result = prime * result + Float.floatToIntBits(this.${field.name});
				 	#elseif (${field.type.name} == "double")
				 		long temp;
				 		temp = Double.doubleToLongBits(this.${field.name});
				 		result = prime * result + (int)(temp ^ temp >>> 32);
				 	#else
						result = prime * result + this.${field.name};
					#end
				#else
					result = prime * result + (this.${field.name} ==null ? 0 : this.${field.name}.hashCode());
				#end
			#end
		    return result;
			}
			</fc:method>

			<fc:method name="equals">
			/**
                 * equals method for ${class.name}
                 *
                 * @see java.lang.Object#equals()
                 */
            @Override
			public boolean equals(Object obj){
			if(obj==this){
			return true;
			}
			if(obj==null){
			return false;
			}
			if(getClass()!=obj.getClass()){
			return false;
			}
			${class.name} ${class.defaultInstance} = (${class.name}) obj;
			#foreach ($field in ${fields})
				<fc:import>${field.type.fullyQualifiedName}</fc:import>
				#if (${field.typeNative})
					#if (${field.type.name} == "float")
						if (Float.floatToIntBits(this.${field.name}) != Float.floatToIntBits(${class.defaultInstance}.${field.name})){
					#elseif (${field.type.name} == "double")
						if(Double.doubleToLongBits(this.${field.name}) != Double.doubleToLongBits(${class.defaultInstance}.${field.name})){
					#else
						if(this.${field.name} != ${class.defaultInstance}.${field.name}){
					#end
					return false;
					}
				#else
					if (this.${field.name} == null){
						if (${class.defaultInstance}.${field.name} != null){
						return false;
						}
					}else if(!this.${field.name}.equals(${class.defaultInstance}.${field.name})){
					return false;
				}
				#end
			#end
			return true;
			}
			</fc:method>

template.name: JSON_FROM_CLASS
template.description: Used to Create json form a class.

template.name: JSON_FROM_CLASS_AS_FILE
template.description: Used to Create json form a class as a file.
template.template-body:
<fc:file folder="${folder.projectRelativePath}" name="${fileName}.js"> #macro( makeJson $fields, $tabStr, $jsonOutput) #set ($jsonOutput = "$jsonOutput {
") #set ($length = 0) #set ($Qt = '"') #foreach ($field in ${fields}) #set ($length = $length + 1) #end #set ($i = 0) #foreach ($field in ${fields}) #if (${i} < $length - 1) #set ($last = false) #else #set ($last = true) #end #set ($value = ${field.value}) #if(${field.array}) #set ($value = "[{}]") #end #if (${field.type.name.startsWith("List")}) #set ($value = "[{}]") #end #if (${field.type.name.startsWith("Map")}) #set ($value = "[{}]") #end #if (${field.type.name} == "String") #set ($value = "${Qt} ${Qt}") #end #if (${field.childFields.isEmpty()}) #set ($jsonOutput = "${jsonOutput} ${tabStr} ${Qt}${field.name}${Qt} : ${value}") #if (!${last})#set ($jsonOutput = "${jsonOutput},
")#end #else #set ($jsonOutput = "${jsonOutput} ${tabStr} ${Qt}${field.name}${Qt} : ") #makeJson (${field.childFields}, "${tabStr}	", ${jsonOutput})#if (!${last})#set ($jsonOutput = "${jsonOutput},
")#end #end #set ($i = $i + 1) #end #set ($jsonOutput = "$jsonOutput }
") #end #set ($tabStr = "") #set ($jsonOutput = "") #makeJson ($fields, ${tabStr}, ${jsonOutput}) ${jsonOutput} </fc:file>

template.name: XML_FROM_CLASS
template.description: Used to Create xml form a class.
template.template-body:
#macro( makeXml $fields) #set ($length = 0) #set ($Qt = '"') #foreach ($field in ${fields}) #set ($length = $length + 1) #end #set ($i = 0) #foreach ($field in ${fields}) #if (${i} < $length - 1) #set ($last = false) #else #set ($last = true) #end #set ($value = ${field.value}) #if (${field.array}) #set ($value = "[{}]") #end #if (${field.type.name.startsWith("List")}) #set ($value = "[{}]") #end #if (${field.type.name} == "String") #set ($value = "${Qt}${Qt}") #end #if (${field.childFields.isEmpty()}) 	<${field.name}>${value}</${field.name}>#if (!${last})
#end #else 	<${field.name}> 
 #makeXml (${field.childFields})
</${field.name}>#if (!${last})
#end #end #set ($i = $i + 1) #end #end <${class.defaultInstance}> #makeXml ($fields) </${class.defaultInstance}>

template.name: XML_FROM_CLASS_AS_FILE
template.description: Used to Create xml form a class as a file.
template.template-body:
<fc:file folder="${folder.projectRelativePath}" name="${fileName}.xml"> #macro( makeXml $fields) #set ($length = 0) #set ($Qt = '"') #foreach ($field in ${fields}) #set ($length = $length + 1) #end #set ($i = 0) #foreach ($field in ${fields}) #if (${i} < $length - 1) #set ($last = false) #else #set ($last = true) #end #set ($value = ${field.value}) #if (${field.array}) #set ($value = "[{}]") #end #if (${field.type.name.startsWith("List")}) #set ($value = "[{}]") #end #if (${field.type.name.startsWith("Map")}) #set ($value = "[{}]") #end #if (${field.type.name} == "String") #set ($value = "${Qt}${Qt}") #end #if (${field.childFields.isEmpty()}) 	<${field.name}>${value}</${field.name}>#if (!${last})
#end #else 	<${field.name}> 
 #makeXml (${field.childFields})
</${field.name}>#if (!${last})
#end #end #set ($i = $i + 1) #end #end <${class.defaultInstance}> #makeXml ($fields) </${class.defaultInstance}> </fc:file>

template.name: CREATE_STATIC_STRING_FIELD_AND_IMPORT
template.description: Used to create a static string field and import.
template.additional-parameters: targetClass:class(label="Target Class") fieldName value staticImport:boolean(label="Do Static Import" value="true")
template.template-body: <fc:field class="${targetClass.fullyQualifiedName}" name="${fieldName.toUpperCase()}"> #if (${targetClass.isInterface()}) String ${fieldName.toUpperCase()} = "${value}"; #else public static final String ${fieldName.toUpperCase()} = "${value}"; #end </fc:field> #if($staticImport) <fc:import>${targetClass.fullyQualifiedName}#${fieldName.toUpperCase()} </fc:import> ${fieldName.toUpperCase()} #else <fc:import>${targetClass.fullyQualifiedName}</fc:import> ${targetClass.name}.${fieldName.toUpperCase()} #end

template.name: DELEGATE_METHOD
template.description: Used to Create delegate method.
template.template-body:
<fc:import>${class.fullyQualifiedName}</fc:import> <fc:import>javax.annotation.Resource</fc:import> <fc:field name="${class.defaultInstance}"> @Resource private ${class.name} ${class.defaultInstance}; </fc:field> #foreach ($method in ${methods}) <fc:method name="${method.name}"> #set ($arg = "") #set ($assign = "") #set ($return = "void") #set ($excptn = "") #if (${method.returnType}) #set ($assign = "${assign} ${method.returnType.name} ${method.name} = ") <fc:import>${method.returnType.fullyQualifiedName}</fc:import> #set ($return = "${method.returnType.name}") #end #foreach($param in ${method.parameters}) #set ($arg = "${arg}${param.type.value}") #if ($foreach.count < ${method.parameters.size()}) #set ($arg = "${arg},") #end #end #foreach ($exp in ${method.exceptions}) #set ($excptn = "${excptn}${exp.name}") #if ($foreach.count < ${method.exceptions.size()}) #set ($excptn = "${excptn},") #end <fc:import>${exp.fullyQualifiedName}</fc:import> #end
/** * *@return */ @Override public ${return} ${method.name} () ${excptn} { ${assign} ${class.defaultInstance}.${method.name}(${arg}); #if ($return != "void") return ${method.name}; #end } </fc:method> #end

template.name: INSTANCE_OF_CLASSES
template.description: Used to Create instance of classes.
template.template-body: <fc:import>javax.annotation.Resource</fc:import> #foreach ($class in ${classes}) <fc:import>${class.fullyQualifiedName}</fc:import> <fc:field name="${class.defaultInstance}"> @Resource private ${class.name} ${class.defaultInstance}; </fc:field> #end

template.name: INCLUDE_FILES
template.description: Used to include jsp or js files.
template.template-body: #foreach($file in ${files}) #if (${file.extension} == "js") #end #if (${file.extension} == "jsp") #end #if (${file.extension} == "css") #end #if (${file.extension} == "img" || ${file.extension} == "png" || ${file.extension} == "jpeg") #end #end

template.name: CREATE_IMPL
template.description: Used to Create implementation of interfaces selected.

template.name: CREATE_FILE_AND_INCLUDE
template.description: Used to Create file and include.
template.template-body: <fc:file folder="${folder.projectRelativePath}" name="${fileName}"> </fc:file> ##<jsp:include page="${folder.getName()}/${fileName}" flush="true"/> <script type="text/javascript" src="${folder.name}/${fileName}"></script>

template.name: MULTIPLE_NEW_FILES
template.description: Used to Create multiple files in the selected folder.
template.template-body: #foreach ($fileName in ${fileNames.split("\s+")}) <fc:file folder="${folder.projectRelativePath}" name="${fileName}.${extension}"> test my first jsp </fc:file> #end

template.name: MULTIPLE_NEW_CLASSES
template.description: Used to Create classes of the given names in the specied package.
template.additional-parameters: classNames suffix(allowed_values="DTO Vo DAO Pojo" value="Vo")

template.name: MULTIPLE_NEW_INTERFACES
template.description: Used to Create interfaces of the given names in the specied package.

template.name: COPY_CLASSES
template.description: Used to Create copy classes from one package to another (and change suffix).

template.name: MULTIPLE_ABSTRACT_CLASS
template.description: Used to Create abstract classes of the given names in the selected package.

template.name: EXCEPTION_CLASS
template.description: Used to Create classes which extend Exception in the specied package.

template.name: RUNTIME_EXCEPTION_CLASS
template.description: Used to Create classes which extend RumtimeException in the specied package.

template.name: INSTANCE_OF_GENERIC_DAO
template.description: Used to Create instance parameterised class.
template.template-body: <fc:import>javax.annotation.Resource</fc:import> <fc:import>com.test.dao.GenericDao</fc:import> #foreach ($class in ${classes}) <fc:import>${class.fullyQualifiedName}</fc:import> #if (${common_class_suffix}) #set ($defInst = "${class.defaultInstance}") #foreach ($suffix in ${common_class_suffix}) #if (${class.defaultInstance.toLowerCase().endsWith(${suffix.trim().toLowerCase()})}) #set ($defInst = "${class.defaultInstance.substring(0, ${class.defaultInstance.indexOf(${suffix.trim()})})}") #end #end #end <fc:field name="${defInst}"> @Resource private ${genericClass.name}<${class.name}, Integer> ${defInst}DAO; </fc:field> <fc:xml node="bean" parent="beans" file="${applicationContext.fullPath}"> <bean id="${defInst}DAO" class="${genereicClassImpl.fullyQualifiedName}"> <constructor-arg index="0" value="${class.fullyQualifiedName}"/> <constructor-arg index="1" ref="sessionFactory"/> </bean> </fc:xml> #end

template.name: SWITCH_WITH_ENUM
template.description: create switch case statment with the selected Enum

template.name: IF_ELSEIF_WITH_ENUM
template.description: create if-else-if block with the selected Enum

template.name: SWITCH_WITH_CONSTANTS
template.description: create switch case statment with Constants

template.name: IF_ELSEIF_WITH_CONSTANTS
template.description: create if-else-if block with Constants

template.name: SERVLET
template.description: create a servlet
template.template-body: <fc:class name="${servletname}Servlet" package="${package.name}" project="${project.name}"> import javax.servlet.http.HttpServlet; import javax.servlet.*; public class ${servletname}Servlet extends HttpServlet { } </fc:class> <servlet> <servlet-name>${servletname.toLowerCase()}</servlet-name> <servlet-class>${package.name}.${servletname}Servlet</servlet-class> </servlet> <servlet-mapping> <servlet-name>${servletname.toLowerCase()}</servlet-name> <url-pattern>/${url}</url-pattern> </servlet-mapping>

template.name: COMPARATOR_AS_CLASS
template.description: Used to create comparator class

template.name: FIELD_WITH_VALUE
template.description: Used to create value annotation
template.template-body:
<fc:import>org.springframework.beans.factory.annotation.Value</fc:import>
                #set ($dollar = "$")
                	<fc:field name="${fieldName}">
                	@Value("$dollar{${property.name}}")
                	private String ${fieldName};
               		</fc:field>

template.name: TEST_SUITES
template.description: Used to create Test Suites
template.template-body:
<fc:class type="class" name="Testsuites" package="${targetPackage.name}" project="${targetPackage.javaProject}">
               		 import org.junit.runners.Suite;
               		 import org.junit.runner.RunWith;
					#foreach ($class in ${classes})
						import ${class.fullyQualifiedName};
					#end
               		 @RunWith(Suite.class)
                	 @Suite.SuiteClasses({#foreach ($class in ${classes})${class.name}.class#if ($foreach.count < ${classes.size()}), #end#end})
               		 public class Testsuites {

                	}
                	</fc:class>

template.name: CREATE_FILE_WITH_SELECTED_CONTENT
template.description: Used to Create a file with the selected content.
template.template-body:
<fc:file folder="${folder.projectRelativePath}" name="${fileName}.${enclosing_file.extension}">
					${selected_text}
			 	</fc:file>

template.name: CONVERTER_CLASS
template.description: Used to create converter class
template.template-body:
<fc:class name="${class.name}Converter" package="${class.package.name}" project="${class.package.javaProject}">
			import javax.faces.component.UIComponent;
			import javax.faces.context.FacesContext;
			import javax.faces.convert.Converter;

			public class ${class.name}Converter implements Converter {
				@Override
				public Object getAsObject(FacesContext context, UIComponent component,
						String value) {
					${class.name} ${instance} = new ${class.name}();
					#foreach ($field in ${fields})
						${instance}.${field.setter}(${field.value});
					#end
				}
				@Override
				public String getAsString(FacesContext context, UIComponent component,
						Object value) {
					${class.name} ${instance} = new ${class.name}();
					#foreach ($field in ${fields})
						${field.type.name} ${field.name} = ${instance}.${field.getter}();
					#end
					return null;
				}
			}
			</fc:class>

template.name: OVERRIDE_METHODS
template.description: Used to create a class with override methods of the super class
template.template-body:
<fc:class name ="${ClassName}" package="${package.name}" project="${project.name}"> import ${class.fullyQualifiedName};
public class ${ClassName} extends ${class.name}{
#foreach ($method in ${methods}) #set ($arg = "") #set ($return = "void") #set ($excptn = "") #set ($param_name = "") #if (${method.returnType}) #set ($return = "${method.returnType.name}") #end #foreach($param in ${method.parameters}) #set ($arg = "${arg} ${param.type.name} ${param.name}") #set ($param_name = "${param_name} ${param.name}" ) #if ($foreach.count < ${method.parameters.size()}) #set ($arg = "${arg},") #set ($param_name = "${param_name},") #end #end #foreach ($exp in ${method.exceptions}) #set ($excptn = "${excptn}${exp.name}") #if ($foreach.count < ${method.exceptions.size()}) #set ($excptn = "${excptn},") #end #end
@Override public ${return} ${method.name} (${arg}) ${excptn} { super.${method.name}(${param_name}); #if (${return} != "void") return ${method.returnType.value}; #end } #end } </fc:class>

template.name: CREATE_PROPERTY_AND_INCLUDE
template.description: Used to add property in an existing property file and include.
template.template-body:
<fc:property file="${file.fullPath}">
				${PropertyKey} = ${ProperValues}
			</fc:property>

template.name: CREATE_STATIC_METHOD_AND_IMPORT
template.description: Used to create a static method and import.
template.template-body: <fc:method name="${methodName}" class="${targetClass.fullyQualifiedName}"> <fc:import>${class.fullyQualifiedName}</fc:import> public static void ${methodName}() { } </fc:method> #if($staticImport) <fc:import>${targetClass.fullyQualifiedName}#${methodName}</fc:import> #else <fc:import>${targetClass.fullyQualifiedName}</fc:import> #end

template.name: Create_methods_in_classes
template.additional-parameters: Dao:class DaoImpl:class Service:class ServiceImpl:class Controller:class methodName returnType:class(required="false")

template.name: Create_methods_in_classes_with_test
template.additional-parameters: Dao:class DaoImpl:class Service:class ServiceImpl:class Controller:class methodName returnType:class(required="false") requireDaoImplTestMethod:boolean DaoImplTest:class requireServiceImplTestMethod:boolean ServiceImplTest:class requireControllerTestMethod:boolean ControllerTest:class

template.name: SAMPLE_FILE_TEMPLATE
template.description: Used to create sample file snippet
template.template-body: ##This is a sample template which will work only with file containing tab delimited data #foreach ($data in ${records}) <tr> ${data.Code} : ${data.Country} : ${data.EName} </tr> #end
